attributes.action: Require all alcohol bottles/cans to include details of a mental health helpline
attributes.additional_details:
This is following the sudden death of my sister. Georgia was only 24 and died on the 15th of May following a heavy night of drinking
 
I feel as though had my sister seen a telephone number somewhere to offer help it could of possibly been a different story.
attributes.background: I would like all bottles/cans of alcohol to have a telephone number for a 24/7 mental health helpline somewhere on them that is clear to see.

departments.name: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
